content.question: ​The general term of a sequence is given by <math alttext="a subscript n equals 51 plus 3 open parentheses n minus 10 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>51</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="a subscript 0"><semantics><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is the initial value. Which of the following expressions also gives the general term of the sequence?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="10 plus 3 open parentheses 51 minus n close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mfenced><mrow><mn>51</mn><mo>-</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="51 times 3 to the power of open parentheses n minus 10 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mn>51</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

topic.text: 2.1: Change in Arithmetic and Geometric Sequences

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
